snippet: Lavillenie of France won a fourth straight pole-vault title at the European Indoor Championships in Prague and cleared 6.04 meters in his second attempt to set the championship record.
abstract: Renaud Lavillenie wins pole-vault title at European Indoor Championships in Prague.
lead_paragraph: Lavillenie of France won a fourth straight pole-vault title at the European Indoor Championships in Prague and cleared 6.04 meters in his second attempt to set the championship record.
